name: SHIPIOS-SPACIOS
description:
SHIPIOS-SPACIOS

This game was made for the United Game Jam 2020, and the theme was "two".

Art work: Bubbble-Honey;

Programming & Game Design: @spartan_nm;

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

SHIPIOS-SPACIOS is a "TWO" player 2d spaceshooter game where you must destroy the asteroids and carve your way through and
at the end of the asteroidfield there is a crazy boss waiting for you to have a duel with it.

you need to gain 400 score to get out of the asteroidfield and you need to add 200 more to it from shooting the Boss to win the game.

if you are alone just take control of one of the ships and let the other one alone to DIE! :)

Controlls: player1("Green ship")
move right and left: Arrow key right and left.
Shoot: Arrow key UP.
player2("Blue ship")
move right and left: A and D.
Shoot: W.
Pause game: Escape.
